info.brief_description: Choose how little Hana's motherhood plays out!
info.description:
Her name is Hana Kohaku. She's a 10 year old (older if desired) Japanese-American girl living with her parents and baby sister Makoto. One of her biggest dreams is to become a mother someday - and these are the paths she'll take.

Feel free to add to this!

-Sex is allowed, but use discretion if it is for the younger Hana.
-Hyper pregnancy is allowed (though no room-sized pregnancies please)!
-Birth is DEFINITELY allowed!
-Hana's sexual orientation can be interchangeable!
-Alien is permitted, though only if they are humanoid.

-No scat or watersports.
